description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              1. Quality Management System control:
              
              + Maintain Quality management system follow new IATF16949: 2016
              
              + Internal audit.
              
              + Ensure all requirement of new IATF 16949: 2016
              
              2. Quality planning:
              
              + Manage Quality planning team
              
              + Create Quality policy & Target.
              
              + Make overall planning, training, deployment & audit to achieve target.
              
              + Suggestion activity: deployment, supervise & control.
              
              3. Quality training:
              
              + On job training (OJT) for new staff.
              
              + Quality tool training: 5W1H, 5Why, QC 7 tool, 5 Core tool... etc.
              
              + QMS training
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              1. University graduated
              
              2. Male / Female ; Age: 25-35
              
              3. Experience on Quality management system field (ISO 9001/TS 16949/IATF 16949)
              
              4. Quality Internal auditor certificate.
              
              5. Good planning, management & teaching skill.
              
              6. Knowledge & use the quality tool: 5W1H, 5Why, QC 7 tool, 5 Core tool...
              
              7. Hai Duong residents are preferred
